frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the L.L. Wolf Time Book and Roster, 1929-1929 A Collection in the

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: L.L. Wolf Time Book and Roster 1929
did.abstract: Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers Time Book and Roster for the Year 1929 for L. L. Wolf. Recorded are times worked, pay, places traveled to and from, etc. Includes a few personal notes and notes on weather. The following information was provided by the seller: "He rode 34,580 miles, worked 210 days. Back of book has pages of runs of over 100 Miles, miles paid for and overtime limits; rates of pay for passenger service, freight service, local freight service, yard service; the roster of engineers as of July 1, 1927 (pages of names, including date emp. as fireman, date prom. to engineer, and B. of L.E. Div.), yard engineers; out of service and honorary members; table showing time after which overtime accrues on runs 100 miles to 199 miles, etc."

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: L.L. Wolf Time Book and Roster, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 01/29/2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally described in January 2010 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/L.L._Wolf

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers Time Book and Roster for the Year 1929 for L. L. Wolf. Recorded are times worked, pay, places traveled to and from, etc. Includes a few personal notes and notes on weather. The following information was provided by the seller: "He rode 34,580 miles, worked 210 days. Back of book has pages of runs of over 100 Miles, miles paid for and overtime limits; rates of pay for passenger service, freight service, local freight service, yard service; the roster of engineers as of July 1, 1927 (pages of names, including date emp. as fireman, date prom. to engineer, and B. of L.E. Div.), yard engineers; out of service and honorary members; table showing time after which overtime accrues on runs 100 miles to 199 miles, etc."
